Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: CourseNotes AI application

Features:
- AI-powered notes generation with Claude
- Interactive quizzes with detailed explanations
- Visual summaries with FLUX image generation
- Custom prompt support for personalized generation
- Modern Three.js animated hero section
- Admin password protected note deletion
- PDF export functionality

Tech stack: Next.js 16, TypeScript, Supabase, Three.js, Tailwind CSS

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
